Both ALI213 and 3DMGAME cracks work for offline mode but you cannot save your progress. That's what I read.

If you have a legit game that uses G4WL, log in there first are make sure auto-login and remember pass is checked. After that just launch Dark Souls and it'll log you in on offline mode. This is how I run my cracked G4WL games (though some like Gears of War won't save achievements).

If you don't have access to that I'm not sure what to do. You can try downloading the Games for Windows Marketplace client, download Age of Empires Online, and log in through there.

This is a masterpiece of a game, bashed by many for being a horrible port. Yes it is bad, but using a 360 controller and Dsfix (many thanks to its creator) it is perfectly playable (40+ hours of play so far). You will experience the rare fps problems but much less than in the console version. If I had easy access to dollars I would definitely buy this game for the multiplayer. To install I used the 1111... serial and that was it. Follow instructions, use a controller and dsfix and you will have a great time with Dark Souls.
